name: SQL script demo lectura particiones delta

properties.description: Ejemplos de como se eliminan particiones en la lectura de formato delta, aÃºn estando en niveles inferiores.

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsopenclassanalytics.dfs.core.windows.net/std/test/Sales/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) 
    /*WITH (
        SaleId int,
        SalesLineId int,
        Date datetime,
        Date_year int,
        Date_month varchar(2),
        Date_date varchar(2)
    )*/ AS [result]
where Date = '2019-01-01'
--where Date_date = '2019-01-01'
--where Date_year = '2019' and DateTime_month = '01' and DateTime_day = '01'

--where Date >= '2019-01-01' and Date < '2019-02-01'

--where Date_date >= '2019-01-01' and DateTime_date < '2019-02-01'
